mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_GROUP ( USER_NO, GAME_NO, SG_NAME, SG_REGDATE, SG_ENDDATE, SG_CAPA, SG_LEVEL, SG_PLUS, SG_GROUPLIMIT ) VALUES ( #{user_no}, #{game_no}, #{sg_name}, #{sg_regdate}, #{sg_enddate}, #{sg_capa}, #{sg_level}, #{sg_plus}, #{sg_grouplimit} )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(SG_REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SG_REGDATE, SG_NO, USER_NO, GAME_NO, SG_NAME, SG_ENDDATE, SG_CAPA, SG_LEVEL, SG_PLUS, SG_GROUPLIMIT FROM STUDY_GROUP
